sources.name: DS_ADLSGEN2_DELIMITED
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  DS_ADLSGEN2_DELIMITED

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DS_ADLSGEN2_DELIMITED = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://sanjosemar.dfs.core.windows.net/curated/HR/SAIDA/10000 Records.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = DS_ADLSGEN2_DELIMITED,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"Password"})
in
  #"Removed columns";
